short_summary: Procurement of aviation replacement parts for the CC-177 Globemaster aircraft
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking proposals from qualified suppliers for the procurement of 1 item for the CC-177 Globemaster aircraft. The procurement is part of a supply arrangement for aviation replacement parts and is restricted to suppliers who have been invited to participate in this opportunity. The department is seeking the highest combined rating of technical merit and price from suppliers.
full_summary:
# Aviation Replacement Parts for CC-177 Globemaster

## Solicitation

* **Solicitation Number**: W8485-247827/B
* **Publication Date**: October 30, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 14, 2023, 14:00:00 EST
* **Amendment Date**: November 14, 2023

## Background

The Department of National Defense is seeking proposals for the acquisition of replacement parts for the CC-177 Globemaster aircraft. The procurement is under Solicitation W8485-247827/B, with the tender closing on November 14, 2023.

## Requirements

* **Requirement Description**: The solicitation aims to acquire 1 item for the CC-177 Globemaster for the Department of National Defense (DND), Directorate of Aerospace Procurement (DAP) DAP4.
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Traditional

## Eligibility

* **Eligible Suppliers**: Only Qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders of Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 series are eligible to submit proposals.
* **Invited Suppliers**: The following companies have been invited to submit proposals:
	+ Aero Precision Industries LLC
	+ Aero Technical Components Inc.
	+ Bis F (Business Solutions Fasteners) International Inc.
	+ JHT Defense Inc.
	+ Mills/Sterling Aerospace Inc.
	+ Patlon Aircraft & Industries Limited
	+ Simex Defence Inc.
	+ Tower Aerospace Inc.
	+ Unisource Technology Inc.
	+ L3 Technologies MAS Inc.
	+ Tronosjet Maintenance Inc.
	+ Tulmar Safety
	+ Canada West Avionics
	+ Honeywell Ltd
	+ Mattis Aerospace
	+ M1 Composites Technology
	+ Rockwell Collins Canada
	+ S3 Aerodefense
	+ CASP
	+ Bristow

## Proposal Submission

* **Proposal Submission**: Proposals must be submitted in accordance with the instructions provided in the solicitation documents.
* **Selection Criteria**: Proposals will be evaluated based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

## Contracting Authority

* **Contracting Authority**: Brendan Vick, DAP 4-3-2, Aerospace Equipment Program Management (DGAEPM), Department of National Defense (DND) /
